source.name: Food Recalls: Pie Chart
source.description:
This dataset includes the most significant product actions over the last five years based on the extent of distribution and the degree of health risk. In this section, you will find a listing of FDA and industry press releases regarding the product recalls.

The recalls on the list are mainly Class I. A record of all recalls (Class I, II, and III) can be found in the FDA Enforcement Report10. See also Definitions of Class I, II, and III recalls11.
